charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to Import 50 Grams or more of methamphetamine or 500 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of Methamphetamine .  PENALTY  :  10 Years to Life and/or $ 10 Million , $ 100.00 Special Assessment . At least a 5 Year Term of Supervised Release .(1)

Importation of 50 Grams or more of methamphetamine of 500 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of Mehtamphetamine .    PENALTY  :  10 Years to Life and / or $ 10 Million , $100.00 Special Assessment . At least a 5 year Term of Supervised Release .(2)

Knowingly , willfully, and unlawfully import from a place outside the United States to wit the Republic of Mexico to a place in the U.S. to wit a controlled substance approximately 18.64  kilograms of liquid methamphetamine .  Knowingly ,intentionally possess with the intent to distribute the above mentioned controlled substance . Furthermore, conspire to posses with intent to distribute .

charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to smuggle bulk cash into the United States.   PENALTY :  Not more than 5 years, and / or $ 250,000.00 , $ 100.00 Special Assessment . Not more than a 3 year Term of Supervised Release .(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Time served; 3 yrs srt, with 3 mos home confinement, comply with all standard and mandatory conditions; $100 s/a; fine waived; 75 hrs com/svs w/in 2 yrs of srt; mental health program; waived appeal
